Message:
One world was overrun
with demonic plants—
the most dangerous world
we’ve encountered so far.
We fought with everything we had,

but Solomon—the acolyte of
the most ancient demon—
reawakened an even more
powerful Curse.

Elaine chased after Solomon,
but he got away...

In the end, we had no choice
but to seal the Curse away
inside seeds.

We knew the seals would
eventually be broken,
but there was nothing else
we could do.

That was because...
something strange
was happening to
the Hero of the Staff...
